page:
OpenMath Projects
These pages host information about past and present OpenMath activities.
Current Projects
The OpenMath Thematic Network, an activity funded by the European Union which started in 2001.
Previous Projects
The OpenMath Esprit Project, an activity funded by the European Union between 1997 and 2000.
Editing and Computing Project (PDF), an activity funded by the European Union between 1995 and 1996.
